# Final Gate — Still Ecosystem PR Checklist

## Canon Preservation
- [ ] YES — I did not delete canon; changes are additive (Snapshot/Amendments/Changelog).
- [ ] YES — Any contradictions are preserved and marked CONFLICT.

## Approval Status
- [ ] YES — Any implementation work is APPROVED FEATURE (or marked BLOCKED if not).
- [ ] YES — UNAPPROVED items are clearly labeled and not implemented.

## My Vanilla Test
- [ ] YES — Any created/changed feature includes My Vanilla Test rating.
- [ ] YES — Anything < ⭐4 is tagged DO NOT IMPLEMENT.

## Docs + Index
- [ ] YES — Relevant docs updated under Still – MANUAL architecture.
- [ ] YES — 02_Codex/99_Master_Index.md updated if new docs were added.

## Build / Sanity
- [ ] YES — Repo is in a runnable state or changes are docs-only.
